definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The floral arrangement oasis is the base where your flowers are anchored.
sentences.chinese: 綠洲的插花是在你的花錨定基。

sentences.english: Why don't you try the flower arranging?
Then they went on to express their thanks to the hostess for her delicately arranged flowers.
sentences.chinese: 接着他們對女主人精心的插花表示感謝。

sentences.english: Reiko: There's some professionals for both flower arrangement and tea ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 在學校有專業的插花和茶道老師。

sentences.english: I like ikebana very much and I take classes in it.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡插花，並且我由參加插花的課程。

sentences.english: I like ikebana very much and I take classes in it.

sentences.english: It was a two-meter tall flower arrangement in the shape of a dollar sign.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個兩米的一個美元符號形狀高大插花。

sentences.english: There's no longer the preconception that men cannot arrange flowers.
sentences.chinese: 認爲男人不能插花的偏見已經不復存在了。

sentences.english: In my personal florist, I can flower arrangement or plant.
sentences.chinese: 在我的私人花店中，我可以插花或者種植。

sentences.english: Floral vessels have been made in China since time immemorial .
sentences.chinese: 中國自古即有插花習慣，及特製的花器。

sentences.english: Neither my friends nor I am interested in flower arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友們都對插花不感興趣。

sentences.english: I like ikebana very much and I take classes in it.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡插花，並而且我由參加插花的課程。

sentences.english: I like ikebana very much and I take classes in it.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡插花，並而且我由參加插花的課程。

sentences.english: Ikebana has now spread to other parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 現在海外也有很多女性開始學習插花。

sentences.english: Ann: There's no longer the preconception that men cannot arrange flowers.
sentences.chinese: 認爲男人不能插花的偏見已經不復存在了。

sentences.english: Get more tips for arranging silk flowers in this free floral arrangement video.
sentences.chinese: 找安排在這個自由插花視頻絲花更多技巧。
